long_description: Lightweight and packable, the REI Rainwall jacket offers boys the waterproof, wind-blocking and breathable performance they need when their outdoor adventures lead them into wet or windy weather. 2.5-layer ripstop nylon is waterproof, breathable and windproof; seams are sealed for complete protection. 3-panel hood features a rain brim, rip-and-stick adjustment and elastic at the opening for a comfortable fit; hood can be stowed in the collar when not in use. Adjustable cuffs help seal out the elements; dropped tail offers additional coverage. Zippered hand pockets and chest pocket hold essentials. Tricot-lined collar feels warm and soft against the skin. The REI Rainwall jacket includes an internal locker loop for easy hanging and a write-on ID label.
short_description: Lightweight and packable, the REI Rainwall jacket offers boys the waterproof, wind-blocking and breathable performance they need when their outdoor adventures lead them into wet or windy weather.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Boys And Girls
